RelatedSentence: ( WHNT ) - Huntsville Police have reopened Memorial Parkway again near the Vermont Road exit following a deadly wreck Monday morning .
The wreck involved a motorcycle , and the woman driving it died on the scene .
She was headed north on the Parkway just over the Golf Road overpass when she lost control just before 9:15 a.m.  Police say she hit the inside barrier and a light pole .

Police identified the woman as Christina Renee Brazier , 23 , of Huntsville .
